text: Ara tara ceye bara yalima ara ke ye allah‌ sambbad'dhe mithya ratana kare, kimba bale, ‘amara kache ohi haya,’athaca tara prati kichu'i ohi kara haya na ebam ye bale, ‘allah‌ ya nayila karechena ami'o tara mata nayila karaba?’ Yadi apani dekhate petena, yakhana yalimara mrtyu yantranaya thakabe ebam phirisatagana hata bariye balabe, ‘tomadera prana bera kara. Aja tomaderake abamananakara sasti deya habe, karana tomara allah‌ra upara asatya balate ebam tamra ayatasamuha samparke ahankara karate.’
